summary: Public transport  is the transport of passengers.
full_text: Transportation in the United States is facilitated by road, air, rail, and waterways . The vast majority of passenger travel occurs by automobile for shorter distances, and airplane or railroad for some people, for longer distances. In descending order, most cargoes travel by railroad, truck, pipeline, or boat; air shipping is typically used only for perishables and premium express shipments.
title: Transportation in the United States
